thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Biddeford Heated Plush Throw Only $21.41 Shipped (Regularly $79.99)
thread.title_full: Kohl’s Cardholders: Biddeford Heated Plush Throw Only $21.41 Shipped (Regularly $79.99)

author: Kimberly (Stylish Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Biddeford Heated Plush Throw Only $21.41 Shipped (Regularly $79.99)
text:
Through January 22nd, head over to Kohl’s.com where all you cardholders can save 30% off your entire purchase with the promo code COCOA30 at checkout AND cardholders will score FREE shipping on every order with the code FREE4JAN at checkout. You can also save 15% off mattresses, bedding and curtains when you use the code SLEEPWELL at checkout. AND yes, all three of these codes are stackable!
As one idea, this Biddeford Heated Plush Throw is on sale for just $35.99 (regularly $79.99). Check out the deal you can score…
Kohl’s Cardholder Deal Idea: Buy 1 Biddeford Heated Plush Throw $35.99 (reg. $79.99) 
Use codes COCOA30 , FREE4JAN and SLEEPWELL 
Final Cost $21.41 shipped!
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off your entire purchase or 20% off when you spend over $100 with code SAVEMORE at checkout (expires 1/16). Shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available near you.
Through January 16th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from January 17th – January 28th.
